get_account.label: Account
get_account.curl: access_token=$(curl -s -X POST 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/oauth2/token' -u 'access_token:access_secret' -d 'grant_type=client_credentials' | jq -r '.access_token') && curl -X GET 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/identity/openidconnect/userinfo/?schema=openid' -H 'Authorization: Bearer $access_token'

get_payments.label: Payments
get_payments.curl: access_token=$(curl -s -X POST 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/oauth2/token' -u 'access_token:access_secret' -d 'grant_type=client_credentials' | jq -r '.access_token') && curl -X GET 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/payments/payment' -H 'Authorization: Bearer $access_token'

webhooks.label: Webhooks
webhooks.curl: access_token=$(curl -s -X POST 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/oauth2/token' -u 'access_token:access_secret' -d 'grant_type=client_credentials' | jq -r '.access_token') && curl -X GET 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/notifications/webhooks' -H 'Authorization: Bearer $access_token'

balance.label: Balance
balance.curl: access_token=$(curl -s -X POST 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/oauth2/token' -u 'access_token:access_secret' -d 'grant_type=client_credentials' | jq -r '.access_token') && curl -X GET 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/reporting/balances' -H 'Authorization: Bearer $access_token'

Account.label: Account
Account.curl:
curl -X GET 'https://app.posthog.com/api/users/@me/?personal_api_key=<api_key>' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' 
 OR curl -X GET 'https://eu.posthog.com/api/users/@me/?personal_api_key=<api_key>' -H 'Content-Type: application/json'
